forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 6 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco this afternoon, the sun shines brightly, a gentle warmth touching the city’s iconic streets like a soft embrace. Expect the day to glide towards a pleasant high in the mid-60s, with the crispness of a west-southwest wind dancing through at 14 mph, occasionally teasing with gusts that hint at the spirited energy of the bay. As the afternoon unfolds, temperatures will dip slightly, bringing a refreshing coolness that recalls the calming steady cadence of waves lapping against the shore.

Tonight, the sky will drape itself in a veil of soft clouds, with temperatures sinking to a mild 57 degrees. The breeze will mellow, whispering softly around 6 to 13 mph—a soothing backdrop for an evening stroll. While the marine layer may linger off in the distance, casting a ghostly silhouette across the horizon, it allows for a rare glimpse of clarity that casts the Bridge in ethereal light, inviting locals to engage in their surroundings. A light jacket or a cozy sweater would be wise as the evening approaches, ensuring comfort as you wander through neighborhood cafes or perhaps linger at a favorite park bench to watch the day’s quiet end. In this tranquil backdrop, the city invites you to savor moments—whether you choose to explore new eateries or lose yourself in a book while the world gently hushes around you.
